snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin and leaders of former Soviet states established a joint task force to counter any terrorist threats to Central Asia.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin and other officials call on allies to increase military activity in regions bordering Afghanistan so militants cannot gain access to Central Asia and potentially to Syria.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin and leaders of former Soviet states established a joint task force to counter any terrorist threats to Central Asia.

headline.print_headline: Russia and Allies to Watch for Threat From Afghanistan
headline.main: Russia and Allies to Raise Guard at Borders With Afghanistan
